      • compareTwoDates

        public int compareTwoDates(java.lang.String firstDate,
                           java.lang.String secondDate)
        Given two dates compare if they are equal
        Parameters:
        firstDate - the first date entered
        secondDate - the second date entered
        Returns:
        returns {-1} when first date occurs before second date, {0} when both dates are equal {1} when second date is greater than first date and {-2} if any of the dates passed is null or is empty

      • compareDateAgainstToday

        public int compareDateAgainstToday(java.lang.String theDate)
        Compares date against today's date
        Parameters:
        theDate - passed as first date to first date
        Returns:
        -1 if date is before today, 0 if equal, 1 if date is greater than today's date and -2 otherwise
